create.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.
create.value: Optional string to set as data.

add.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.
add.value: Optional string to set as data.

replace.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.
replace.value: Optional string to set as data.

open.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.
open.value: Optional string to set as data.

enter.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.
enter.value: Optional string to set as data.

add_attribute.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.
add_attribute.name: Name of the attribute.

enqueue_after.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.

enqueue_before.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.

enqueue_on_add.path: A XML-Path to the leaf node.

set_root_name.value: A string to set as the name of the root tag.
